amendatorysection.para: The State Treasurer shall give the clerk of the district court a receipt for each sum paid by the clerk to the State Treasurer under the provisions of sections 24-345 to 24-349, which receipt shall specify, among other things, the amount paid, and the title and appearance docket and number of the given case or proceeding. The clerk of the district court shall keep a record in his or her office, in connection with the given case or proceeding, of the date and amount of any money paid by him or her to the State Treasurer under the provisions of said sections.
